column2: Frankfurt School of Finance and Management
column5: OverviewOur Master in Management programme offers innovative core modules combined with cutting-edge concentrations to instil key managerial and business development competencies to prepare digitally savvy analysts, ethical entrepreneurs, innovative managers and global business leaders.HighlightsGain in-demand competencies through Frankfurt School’s innovative and practical teaching approach:
column7: Tuition fee: EUR 35,500  Early Bird discounts for early applicants: 1st Early bird discount, apply by 30 November: EUR 4,000 2nd Early bird discount, apply by 31 March: EUR 2,000 Application deadline is 30 June; applications after the deadline is subject to availability.
